ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The current level 27 song does a charm for +10 level.  I.E. to level 37.  So how about a charm here that also does +10 levels to level 49?  Goes with the
ygData.messageBody:
> Level 39: Invis to Undead (useful in Lower guk etc)

The current level 27 song does a charm for +10 level. I.E. to level 37. So
how about a charm here that also does +10 levels to level 49? Goes with the
current theme.

> Level 45: An upgraded Bellow/DD song (giving us better combat skills)

Unfortantly I don't think we will ever be DDers. This is nice but I would
rather like to see another party buff. Something that goes along with what
we already play. And in preperation for the planes.

> Level 47: Summon Corpse song (like the necro one)

Already in the game

> Level 49: Upgraded older song (such as charm) or a combo song (2 effects
> such as hymm and clarity)

I'm sure this will be left to a Necro only ability, but anyway, how about a
song that works cross zones to get the bard to there own corpse? Something
like a duet between Jonthan and Lyssa.

Also I would love to see Verant break away from the one song a level thing
and give us some other songs to play with. I of course want a bind and a
gate. And a feign death song would make us much better pullers. Ports to the
stages all over Norath would have to be my absolute most wanted feature.

Kealus
Ec'i
